name: Salesforce
natural_language_description: 这是 Salesforce 节点。主要用于: Consume Salesforce API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: OAuth Authorization Flow | 默认值: oAuth2
available_options: OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)
OAuth2 JWT (值: jwt)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: lead
available_options: Account (值: account) - Represents an individual account, which is an organization or person involved with your business (such as customers, competitors, and partners)
Attachment (值: attachment) - Represents a file that a has uploaded and attached to a parent object
Case (值: case) - Represents a case, which is a customer issue or problem
Contact (值: contact) - Represents a contact, which is an individual associated with an account
Custom Object (值: customObject) - Represents a custom object
Document (值: document) - Represents a document
Flow (值: flow) - Represents an autolaunched flow
Lead (值: lead) - Represents a prospect or potential
Opportunity (值: opportunity) - Represents an opportunity, which is a sale or pending deal
Search (值: search) - Search records
Task (值: task) - Represents a business activity such as making a phone call or other to-do items. In the user interface, and records are collectively referred to as activities.
User (值: user) - Represents a person, which is one user in system
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: invoke
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many flows
Invoke (值: invoke) - Invoke a flow
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

externalId.name: externalId
externalId.description: The field to check to see if the account already exists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
externalId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Match Against | 作用: The field to check to see if the account already exists. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

externalIdValue.name: externalIdValue
externalIdValue.description: If this value exists in the 'match against' field, update the account. Otherwise create a new one.
externalIdValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value to Match | 作用: If this value exists in the 'match against' field, update the account. Otherwise create a new one. | (必填项)

company.name: company
company.description: Company of the lead. If person account record types have been enabled, and if the value of Company is null, the lead converts to a person account.
company.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company | 作用: Company of the lead. If person account record types have been enabled, and if the value of Company is null, the lead converts to a person account. | (必填项)

lastname.name: lastname
lastname.description: Required. Last name of the contact. Limited to 80 characters.
lastname.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | 作用: Required. Last name of the contact. Limited to 80 characters. | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: description (值: None) - Text description of the Document. Limit: 255 characters.
isPrivate (值: None) - Whether this record is viewable only by the owner and administrators (true) or viewable by all otherwise-allowed users (false)
owner (值: None) - ID of the User who owns the attachment. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

leadId.name: leadId
leadId.description: ID of lead that needs to be fetched
leadId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lead ID | 作用: ID of lead that needs to be fetched | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: binaryPropertyName (值: None)
description (值: None) - Text description of the Document. Limit: 255 characters.
isPrivate (值: None) - Whether this record is viewable only by the owner and administrators (true) or viewable by all otherwise-allowed users (false)
name (值: None) - Required. Name of the attached file. Maximum size is 255 characters. Label is File Name.
owner (值: None) - ID of the User who owns the attachment. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: conditionsUi (值: None) - The condition to set
fields (值: None) - Fields to include separated by ,

campaignId.name: campaignId
campaignId.description: ID of the campaign that needs to be fetched. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
campaignId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Campaign Name or ID | 作用: ID of the campaign that needs to be fetched. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the note | (必填项)

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: ID of contact that needs to be fetched
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: ID of contact that needs to be fetched | (必填项)

customObject.name: customObject
customObject.description: Name of the custom object. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
customObject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Object Name or ID | 作用: Name of the custom object. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

customFieldsUi.name: customFieldsUi
customFieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: Filter by custom fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: customFieldsValues (值: None)

recordId.name: recordId
recordId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Record ID | 作用: Record ID to be deleted | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: Required. Name of the attached file. Maximum size is 255 characters. Label is File Name.
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Required. Name of the attached file. Maximum size is 255 characters. Label is File Name. | (必填项)

closeDate.name: closeDate
closeDate.description: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close.
closeDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Close Date | 作用: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close. | (必填项)

stageName.name: stageName
stageName.description: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
stageName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Stage Name or ID | 作用: Required. Date when the opportunity is expected to close. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

opportunityId.name: opportunityId
opportunityId.description: ID of opportunity that needs to be fetched
opportunityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Opportunity ID | 作用: ID of opportunity that needs to be fetched | (必填项)

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.description: ID of account that needs to be fetched
accountId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account ID | 作用: ID of account that needs to be fetched | (必填项)

query.name: query
query.description: A SOQL query. An example query parameter string might look like: “SELECT+Name+FROM+MyObject”. If the SOQL query string is invalid, a MALFORMED_QUERY response is returned.
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: A SOQL query. An example query parameter string might look like: “SELECT+Name+FROM+MyObject”. If the SOQL query string is invalid, a MALFORMED_QUERY response is returned. | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.description: The type of case. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type Name or ID | 作用: The type of case. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

caseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Case ID | 作用: ID of case that needs to be fetched | (必填项)

status.natural_language_description: 参数名: Status Name or ID | 作用: The current status of the task, such as In Progress or Completed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

taskId.description: ID of task that needs to be fetched
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: ID of task that needs to be fetched | (必填项)

apiName.natural_language_description: 参数名: API Name | 作用: Required. API name of the flow. | (必填项)

jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 作用: Whether the input variables should be set via the value-key pair UI or JSON/RAW | 默认值: False
